description: Just like you, our Ski Targeted Cushion Always Explore Print Over The Calf Socks are built for endless adventure. So next time you hit the slopes, bring the natural performance and comfort of responsibly sourced Merino wool along for the ride. With targeted cushioning, body-mapped mesh zones for breathability, and a tailored-to-you fit, these men's wool ski socks will help you stay focused on the runs ahead and less distracted by discomfort.
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Always Explore Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 57% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 30% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane, 1% Polyester
